metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1297 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: When using Distributed Test only (RMI based), Apache JMeter 2.x and 3.x uses an unsecured RMI connection. This could allow an attacker to get Access to JMeterEngine and send unauthorized code.

criterions.comment: jakarta-jmeter: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
